site_areas.name: Name
site_areas.title: Site Area
site_area_tree_error: An error occurred while modifying the Site Area chain.
Avoid circular dependencies within the tree.
For more information please check the logs.
site_area_tree_error_site: An error occurred while modifying the Site Area chain.
Site Area has children with a different Site.
1 - Update all Site Area chain with the new Site
2 - Assign the current parent Site Area to all children
3 - Clear the parent Site Area in all children
site_area_tree_error_smart_charging: An error occurred while modifying the Site Area chain.
Site Area must have the same Smart Charging value as its parent.
Do you want change the Smart Charging value to the whole Site Area chain?
site_area_tree_error_voltage: An error occurred while modifying the Site Area chain.
Site Area must have the same Voltage as its parent.
site_area_tree_error_number_of_phases: An error occurred while modifying the Site Area chain.
Site Area must have the same Number of Phases as its parent.
site_area_tree_error_multiple_actions_no: An error occurred while modifying the Site Area chain.
Multiple changes are currently not supported (eg. change of Site and Smart Charging.)
Perform one change at a time.

authentication.mercedes_data_usage: SAP Labs France is accessing your car’s data via Mercedes-Benz for the purpose of providing you a high quality of service during the charging session of your vehicle. SAP Labs France is processing the following data: EV battery level and range of your car. For allowing the processing of your data, you’ll have to give the explicit consent in the following steps. For any further information please note our End-user Agreement Usage of the e-Mobility Software.

description: E-Mobility provides a certified service to connect to an external E-Roaming Platform.
This feature exposes real-time the charging station infrastructure and availability via the OCPI standard protocol (Open Charge Point Interface).
E-Mobility is currently using the Gireve Inter-Operability Platform (IOP).

description: E-Mobility provides a certified service to connect to an external E-Roaming Platform.
This feature exposes real-time the charging station infrastructure and availability via the OICP protocol (Open InterCharge Protocol).
E-Mobility is currently using the Hubject B2B Service Platform (HBS).
E-Mobility provides a refund service for an external expense system.
This feature allows the user to push his sessions to an expense system and get reimbursed of the electricity he consumed.
E-Mobility is currently using SAP Concur. More technical information available at

description: E-Mobility exposes its data to external analytics tools.
This feature exposes real-time all the session data through a connector to external data analytics tools.
E-Mobility is currently using SAP Analytics Cloud via an OData connector.
SAP Analytics Cloud supports the intelligent use of charging data to simplify operational decision making.

delete.rejected_billed_msg: You cannot delete a session that has been already billed!

delete.success: The session of '{{user}}' has been deleted successfully
delete.error: An error occurred during the deletion of the session, check the logs

roaming.success: The CDR of the session ID '{{sessionID}}' has been pushed successfully to the roaming platform
roaming.error: An error occurred during the push of the CDR, check the logs
roaming.error_not_from_tenant: This session does not belong to this tenant
roaming.error_no_ocpi: This session does not contain OCPI data
roaming.error_cdr_already_pushed: The CDR of this session has already been pushed

soft_stop.success: The session of '{{user}}' has been stopped successfully.
soft_stop.error: An error occurred during session stop, check the logs

refund.partial: {{inSuccess}} sessions have been transferred successfully and {{inError}} session(s) have encountered an error, check the logs
refund.forbidden_refund_another_user: You cannot transfer another user's session
refund.not_authorized: You are not authorized to perform this request
refund.error: The E-Mobility application couldn't connect to the refunding system. Contact an administrator.
refund.concur_connection_invalid: Your refunding system connection is not configured correctly. Contact an administrator.
refund.tenant_concur_connection_invalid: The Organization of your refunding system configuration is not complete. Contact an administrator

no_consumption.title: No Consumption
no_consumption.description: The session does not contains meter values.
no_consumption.action: Check the charging station settings. Ensure that meter values are sent by the charging station.

low_consumption.title: Low Consumption
low_consumption.description: The session has a consumption < 1 kWh.
low_consumption.action: Check the charging station settings. Ensure that meter values are sent by the charging station.

average_consumption_greater_than_connect.title: Consumption Too High
average_consumption_greater_than_connect.description: The average registered charging power is greater than the capacity of the connector.
average_consumption_greater_than_connect.action: Check the charging station settings. Ensure that the connector maximum power is set and valid.

negative_inactivity.title: Negative Inactivity
negative_inactivity.description: The inactivity of the session is negative.
negative_inactivity.action: Check the charging station settings. Ensure that meter values are sent in the correct order.

long_inactivity.title: High Inactivity
long_inactivity.description: The inactivity of the session > 24 hours.

negative_duration.title: Negative Duration
negative_duration.description: The duration of the session is negative.
negative_duration.action: Check the charging station settings. Ensure that meter values are sent in the correct order.

low_duration.title: Low Duration
low_duration.description: The duration of the session < 1 minute.
low_duration.action: Check the charging station settings. Ensure that meter values are sent correctly.

missing_price.title: Missing Price
missing_price.description: The session has not been priced.
missing_price.action: Even though the pricing is activated in the organization, the session has not been priced. Contact your site administrator.

incorrect_starting_date.title: Incorrect Starting Date
incorrect_starting_date.description: The starting date value is incorrect or impossible.
incorrect_starting_date.action: Check the charging station settings. Ensure that the date sent at the start of the session is correct.

missing_user.title: Session with no User
missing_user.description: The User is unknown for this Session.
missing_user.action: Delete the Session or disable the access control in the corresponding Site Area.

no_billing_data.title: Session with no Billing data
no_billing_data.description: There is no billing data for this Session.
no_billing_data.action: Delete the session or create an invoice from it.

templates.create_error: Error occurred while creating the template, check the logs

templates.update_error: Error occurred while updating the template, check the logs

templates.delete_success: The template '{{template}}' has been deleted successfully
templates.delete_error: Error occurred while deleting the template, check the logs

export.confirm: Do you really want to export all the charging station templates matching the filters?
export.error: Error occurred while trying to export the charging station templates, check the logs

notifications.session_started: Notify me when my charging session has started
notifications.optimal_charge_reached: Notify me when the optimal battery level has been reached (85%)
notifications.end_of_charge: Notify me when my electric vehicle is not charging anymore (the electric vehicle is still connected)
notifications.end_of_session: Notify me when my charging session is finished (the electric vehicle is no longer connected)
notifications.user_account_status_changed: Notify me when my user's status has been changed by an Administrator (Active, Blocked…)
notifications.new_registered_user: Notify me when a new user has just registered
notifications.unknown_user_badged: Notify me when an unknown user has badged on a charging station
notifications.charging_station_status_error: Notify me when an error occurred on a charging station’s connector, check the logs
notifications.charging_station_registered: Notify me when a charging station has been registered to the backend or has been restarted
notifications.charging_stations_offline: Notify me when a charging station is offline
notifications.preparing_session_not_started: Notify me when a session has not been started (site owner only)
notifications.ocpi_patch_status_error: Notify me if the transfer of a charging station’s statuses has failed to the roaming platform (OCPI)
notifications.oicp_patch_status_error: Notify me if the transfer of a charging station’s statuses has failed to the roaming platform (OICP)
notifications.billing_synchronization_failed: Notify me when a synchronization with billing system has failed
notifications.billing_periodic_operation_failed: Notify me when a periodic billing operation has failed
notifications.session_not_started: Notify me if no session has been started after badging
notifications.user_account_inactivity: Notify me when I haven't logged in to the application for more than 6 months
notifications.car_catalog_synchronization_failed: Notify me if an error has occurred while synchronization cars, check the logs
notifications.compute_and_apply_charging_profiles_fail: Notify me when applying the smart charging profiles fails for a site area
notifications.end_user_error_notification: Notify me when a user reports an error
notifications.billing_new_invoice: Notify me when a new invoice is available
notifications.admin_account_verification: Notify me when new account creation needs to be verified

reservations.description: Manage reservations on charging stations and connectors
reservations.title: Reservation

reserve_now.title: Complete Reserve Now
reserve_now.confirm: Do you really want to reserve the connector '{{connectorID}}' for user '{{userName}}' on the charging station '{{chargingStationID}}'?
reserve_now.success: The reservation on the charging station '{{chargingStationID}}' at connector '{{connectorID}}' was successfully
reserve_now.error: Error occurred while trying to create a reservation, check the logs

cancel_reservation.title: Cancel Reservation
cancel_reservation.confirm: Do you really want to cancel the reservation at charging station '{{chargingStationID}}'?
cancel_reservation.success: The reservation at charging station '{{chargingStationID}}' is successfully cancelled
cancel_reservation.error: Error occured while trying to cancel the reservation at charging station '{{chargingStationID}}'

create.title: Create Reservation
create.confirm: Do you really want to create a '{{reservationType}}' reservation at charging station '{{chargingStationID}}' on connector '{{connectorID}}'?
create.success: The reservation at '{{chargingStationID}}' on connector '{{connectorID}}' has been created successfully
create.error: Error occurred while adding the reservation, check the logs

update.title: Update Reservation
update.success: The reservation at '{{chargingStationID}}' on connector '{{connectorID}}' has been saved successfully
update.error: Cannot change the reservation details, check the logs

delete.title: Delete Reservation
delete.confirm: Do you really want to delete the reservation?
delete.success: The reservation at '{{chargingStationID}}' on connector '{{connectorID}}' is successfully deleted
delete.error: An error occured during the deletion of the reservation, check the logs

export.title: Export reservations
export.confirm: Do you really want to export all the reservations matching the filters?
export.error: Error occurred while trying to export the reservations, check the logs

delete_reservations.title: Delete Reservation(s)
delete_reservations.confirm: Do you really want to delete '{{quantity}}' reservations?
delete_reservations.partial: {{inSuccess}} reservations have been deleted successfully and {{inError}} reservations have encountered an error, check the logs
delete_reservations.error: {{inError}} failed to be deleted, check the logs
delete_reservations.unexpected_error: Unexpected error occurred while deleting the reservations, check the logs
delete_reservations.reject_deletion_ongoing_reservations: You cannot delete a reservation, which is in progress

general.not_found: The reservation has not been found
general.already_exists: The reservation with the ID {{reservationID}} already exists for another user
general.not_supported: The feature 'Reservations' is not enabled for this charging station
general.collision: This reservation collides with another reservation for this timeslot. Choose another time
general.faulted: The specified charging station or connector changed to 'FAULTED' state during reservation
general.occupied: The specified charging station or connector changed to 'OCCUPIED' state during reservation
general.unavailable: The specified charging station or connector changed to 'UNAVAILABLE' state during reservation
general.multiple_reserve_now: Only one 'RESERVE NOW' reservation per user is possible

reserve_now.title: Reserve now error
reserve_now.not_available: Connector is not available, unable to reserve it

cancel_reservation.title: Error during cancelation of reservation with ID '{{reservationId}}'
cancel_reservation.not_available: Connector is not available, reservation could not be cancelled

error.invalid_date_range: The chosen date range is invalid
error.invalid_expiry_date: The expiry date must be in the future
